```{r}

library(cluster)

N = 160 * 10^3
X = round(matrix(rbeta(26*N, shape1 = 1, shape2 = 10),N, 26),1)
k = 2

# do the clustering
clustering = clara(x = X, 
                   k = k, 
                   metric = "custom_jaccard",
                   w = rbeta(26,shape1 = 1,shape2 = 1),cjratio = 0.75,
                   samples = 50,
                   sampsize = 200)
```
